code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RepositoryLinkInput=_ref=>{let{onSubmit}=_ref;const[repoLink,setRepoLink]=useState('');const handleChange=event=>{setRepoLink(event.target.value);};const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();if(repoLink){onSubmit(repoLink);setRepoLink('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:repoLink,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Enter Git repository link",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]});};export default RepositoryLinkInput;
